question: Is it complusory to have a laptop in First Year?
answer: No, It is not complusory to have a laptop in the first year.We have a Computer Lab which can be accesed 24/7.

question: Do we have to bring Soaps and Detergent with Us?
answer: No, On the first day we will have a shop open which will have all the essentials things like Books, Pens, Combs, Mattress etc.
